channel.title: Bravery Potion
channel.description:
Hi guys, I want to make a new potion that boosts your Attack, Strength, Defence, Range, Mage, Prayer, and HP by 18.
Ill give as much information as I can
the ID for the potion is 739 Im using a 317 Pk Planet V3 Source.
All help is appreciated, thanks :)

item.title: Bravery Potion
item.dc:creator: @v0x v0x
item.description:
@v0x wrote:

potions.java

put this somewhere under break;

[code=java]case 739: //item id
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();

if(c.playerLevel[0] >= 10 && c.playerLevel[1] >= 10 && c.playerLevel[2] >= 10 && c.playerLevel[3] >= 10 && c.playerLevel[4] >= 10 && c.playerLevel[5] >= 10){ //have to be have stats above 10 to drink it
c.setAnimation(0x33D);
c.sM(“You drink the potion!”);
c.deleteItem(739, slot, 1); //bravery potion
c.addItem(291, 1); //vial
c.currentHealth += 18; //hp
c.playerLevel[0] += 18; //attack
c.playerLevel[1] += 18; //defence
c.playerLevel[2] += 18; //strength
c.playerLevel[4] += 18; //range
c.playerLevel[6] += 18; //magic
} else {
c.sM(“You Are to not brave to do this.”); //message that is displayed if req is not met.

} if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints])
c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints];
c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + “”, 4016);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[2] + “”, 4006);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[1] + “”, 4008);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[4] + “”, 4010);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[0] + “”, 4004);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[6] + “”, 4014);
break; // THE END[/code]

post problems if any.

Read full topic
